Package ohos.global.resource

Class RawFileEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.global.resource.RawFileEntry

  • public abstract class RawFileEntry
extends Object
    Manages the raw file in the application package. Resource can be obtained from this class.

    The RawFileEntry instance can be obtained only by using the ResourceManager.getRawFileEntry(String) method.

    Since:
    3
    See Also:
    Resource, ResourceManager

      RawFileEntry​()

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      abstract Entry[] getEntries​()
      Searches for the paths of all raw files.
      abstract Entry.Type getType​()
      Obtains the type of a RawFileEntry, either FOLDER or FILE.
      abstract Resource openRawFile​()
      Gains access to the raw file.
      abstract RawFileDescriptor openRawFileDescriptor​()
      Gains access to the file descriptor of the raw file in the relative path of the rawfile directory in the application package.

      • openRawFile

        public abstract Resource openRawFile​()
                              throws IOException
        Gains access to the raw file.
        Returns:
        Returns the raw file.
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs during the search for all raw files.
        See Also:
        Resource

      • openRawFileDescriptor

        public abstract RawFileDescriptor openRawFileDescriptor​()
                                                 throws IOException
        Gains access to the file descriptor of the raw file in the relative path of the rawfile directory in the application package.
        Returns:
        Returns the file descriptor of the raw file.
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs during the search for all raw files.
        See Also:
        RawFileDescriptor

      • getEntries

        public abstract Entry[] getEntries​()
                            throws IOException
        Searches for the paths of all raw files.
        Returns:
        Returns the paths of all raw files.
        Throws:
        IOException - Throws this exception if an I/O error occurs during the search for all raw files.
        See Also:
        Entry

        Obtains the type of a RawFileEntry, either FOLDER or FILE.
